entry.title: Overview
entry.heading: Introduction
entry.para: This is a fairly full-featured "to-do" list manager that supports private and shared tasks lists, integration with the Calendar function, categories, priorities, due-dates, searches, printing and import/export functions.

entry.title: Sorting Entries
entry.heading: Sorting Entries
entry.para: When viewing a list of entries, you can sort the entries by any column by clicking on the appropriate column heading. To switch columns between ascending and descending order, click on the arrow icon in the column heading.
